name: FNAF World - itch.io Edition
description:
Featuring the entire cast from the Five Nights at Freddy's series, this fantasy RPG will let players control their favorite animatronics in a an epic animated adventure!

To access the new content in Update 2, you must have beaten the game on either Normal or Hard mode. Enter the grey house in area 1 by holding up against it's door; talk to Fredbear after you leave; then enter the portal.
